import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; //import { Radar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import playersArray from "../../globals/skrallgaming/players" import placings from "../../globals/skrallgaming/placings" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/createThornament.css" import { getRoles } from "@testing-library/react"; export default function CreateThornament(){ const { players, setPlayers } = usePlayers() const [ teams, setTeams ] = useState([]) const [ tournamentName, setTournamentName] = useState('SSE-II 2022 Smash Doubles') const [ gameFormat, setGameFormat] = useState('2v2') const [ game, setGame] = useState('smash') const [ groupStage, setGroupStage ] = useState(true) const [ groupMaxPlayers, setGroupMaxPlayers ] = useState(4) const [ teamName, setTeamName] = useState() const [ p1, setP1 ] = useState() const [ p2, setP2 ] = useState() useState(() => {if (!players?.lenght) setPlayers(playersArray)}, []) const registerTeam = () =>{ if (!p1 || !p2 || !teamName) return let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.push({ name: teamName, players: [p1, p2] }) setTeams(arr); } const removeTeam = (i) => { let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.splice(i, 1) setTeams(arr) } const startThornament = () => { if (!teams) return alert("Register teams first!") let matches = [] if (groupStage){ let groups = Array(Math.ceil(teams.length / groupMaxPlayers)) let groupId = 0 for (let i = 0; i < teams.length; i++){ if (!groups[groupId]) groups[groupId] = [] groups[groupId] = [...groups?.[groupId], teams[i]] groupId++ if (groupId === groups.length) groupId = 0 } console.log("Groups:", groups) groups.map((group, i) => { group.map((team, j) => { for(let k = j+1; k < group.length; k++){ matches.push({ "name":"groupmatch", "team1": group[j].name, "team2": group[k].name, }) } }) }) console.log("Matches:", matches) } } return <>
Tournament Info
setTournamentName(e.target.value)} /> Tournament Name
Game Format
Game
setGroupStage(!groupStage)}/>
{groupStage &&<>
setGroupMaxPlayers(v.target.value)} /> Max players per group
}
Elimination type
Team Registration
Player 1
Player 2
setTeamName(e.target.value)} onKeyDown={(k) => {if(k.key === "Enter") registerTeam()}} /> Team name
Registered Teams {teams && teams.map((t, i) => ) }
Team Players
{i+1} {t.name} {t.players.join(' & ')} removeTeam(i)}>❌
{ teams &&
startThornament()}>Hold to start Thornament
}
}
